texto: at least one activity. A set of processes, with their statements of purpose and outcomes, constitute a Process Reference Model (PRM). An activity is a construct of related tasks for producing outcomes, Activities provide a means to organize related tasks within the process, to improve understanding and communication of the process. If an activity is cohesive enough, it can be converted to a lower level process by drafting a purpose and a set of outcomes. 109 © ISO/IEC 2017 – All rights reserved © IEEE 2017 – All rights reserved Authorized licensed use limited to: Burapha University provided by UniNet.
